Merge themes

hc_theme_merge.Rd

Function to combine hc_theme objects.

hc_theme_merge(...)

Arguments

...

hc_theme objects.

Examples


thm <- hc_theme_merge(
  hc_theme_darkunica(),
  hc_theme(
    chart = list(
      backgroundColor = "transparent",
      divBackgroundImage = "http://cdn.wall-pix.net/albums/art-3Dview/00025095.jpg"
    ),
    title = list(
      style = list(
        color = 'white',
        fontFamily = "Erica One"
      )
    )
  )
)
